name: What in Flask?
description:
Has it ever happened to you that you forgot to feed the cat and the door slammed shut?

Good thing you're an Alchemist and have a couple of ingredients (totally harmless to the cat, whatever you think) that will help you and Flask open that stupid door.
Some of the ingredients may lead to unstable results.

The cat will be fed!

Controls:

WASD - Move

E  -Interact

--

Game made for Ludum Dare 49
